north.title: Arran Open Studios Weekend
north.desc: Artists open their studios island-wide for public viewing and craft sales.

north.title: COAST 30th Birthday Celebration
north.desc: Fun-filled marine conservation day with snorkel tasters, boat trips, BBQ, music and more.

north.title: Arran International Festival of Chamber Music and Song
north.desc: Week-long festival of classical and traditional music, concerts and workshops.

north.title: Brodick Shore Scramble (COAST)
north.venue: Merkland Shore (meeting at Brodick Castle Car Park)
north.desc: Guided rock-pool exploration of marine creatures at low tide.

south.title: Waggy Tail Walk & Dog Show
south.desc: 5 km dog walk and fun dog-show, raising funds for Ayrshire Hospice.
